column5: Sometimes the outfitters get a cancellation and they've got planes going in and out on either end of the week, so they offer discounts and try to fill the hole.  Trident Lake, pike, walleye and brook trout, July 29 to Aug 5. $600 plus tax, minimum 4 people.  If someone's interested, here's a Trident trip report to sort of see what it's like.  http://www.canadafishingguide.net/trident-lake-outpost-a-brook-trout-bonanza/
awesome report, Chris!  Looks like a fabulous trip!Doug
Holy Crap! That place looks awesome.
That is a great deal Chris i would be all over that if i was able to get away for those dates and this years fly in trip is already booked for September the 8th-16th.  Cheers Mitch
